article:
I was going on vacation to meet up with my family for a week of fun in Canada.Early in the morning,I got to the airport in Denver ready to  _  my
work behind for a few days.Don't get me  _  .I enjoy my job of helping people with disabilities to  _  a
plane,which is a special education system in our state,but this time it was my  _  !
I was waiting for my flight  _  with a good book to read,when an elderly lady was wheeled to our waiting area.I couldn't help but  _  the
trouble she was having  _  a packet of nuts with her
arthritic hands.No one else was willing to meet her gaze so I offered to help.
She was very  _  .It turned out that these nuts were her entire  _  .The attendants were nowhere to be seen when the  _  came to
board the plane.The lady could walk but needed some assistance,so I  _  to
help her and carry her bag.We had a long chat on the plane.As we were entering another country we needed to  fill out  some forms.I did it for her.
We landed and I needed to  _  planes.but I helped her get off the plane first.The wheelchair she ordered was  _  to
be seen,so we slowly walked to the  _  .Her daughter was waiting there,looking rather  _  .
We only exchanged first names,and she was so grateful to have my assistance.I had to run to  _  my connection.But as I   thought of  the experience,I saw her as my airport angel,because she gave me a  _  to hope that in
the future when I'm  _  and traveling,someone will take the time to help me.Pay it forward.
